recipesJson.name: CinnaGrassPassion
recipesJson.author: Echodub
recipesJson.description:
Another Food Pairing concept here, there is something about this combination i really like.
I have a sweet apple base, topped with the floral notes of hibiscus and counter it with lemon grass and passion fruit and cinnamon.

It's definitely not a usual strawberry cream, but it's made for those vapers who like their juice a bit more special.

reviews.text: I don’t consider myself a basic strawberry and cream guy, but this is so weird that despite vaping a ton of it I still can’t say for sure whether I like it or not. The top notes are tart and citrusy, warm with a hint of spice, and little floral. The base is sweet juicy apple and tart and syrupy passion fruit along with that strange sort of woody richness of lemongrass. It’s a well rounded, full-flavored juice that combines many different elements without being muddled, and that makes it interesting. It’s not harsh at all, despite being citrusy and spicy, it has a smooth finish.
